title: Engie Chairman Says AI Demand Propels Solar Despite US Policies
description: Policy uncertainty is deterring investment in US energy projects, though surging power demand tied to artificial intelligence will continue to support wind and solar farms, Engie SA Chairman Jean-Pierre Clamadieu said Friday.

title: US Stocks Pare Losses on Shutdown Hope as Weekly Win Streak Ends
description: US stocks snapped a three-week run of gains on Friday as investors continued to fret about stretched valuations in the tech sector, but saw a silver lining in Washington lawmakers restarting negotiations over the government shutdown.

title: Grand Theft Auto VI Delay Fails to Faze Take-Two Stock Analysts
description: Gamers took the latest delay to the long-awaited Grand Theft Auto VIÂ  hard, but stock analysts are undaunted, with the vast majority recommending investors stick with Take-Two Interactive Software Inc.
